caption.text: Pre-specified performance measures and acceptable levels.

cell.text: Probability of ranking an intermediate-or-high risk drug above a low risk drug
Probability of ranking a high risk drug above an intermediate-or-low drug
Probability of correctly ranking a drug relative to CiPA reference drugs through pairwise comparison
Likelihood ratio of a positive prediction (high-or-intermediate) occurring in high-or-intermediate risk drugs versus in low risk drugs
Likelihood ratio of a negative prediction (low risk) occurring in high-or-intermediate risk drugs versus in low risk drugs
Likelihood ratio of a positive prediction (high risk) occurring in high risk drugs versus in intermediate-or-low risk drugs
Likelihood ratio of a negative prediction (intermediate-or-low) occurring in high risk drugs versus in intermediate-or-low risk drugs
Average error of classifying each drug into high, intermediate, or low risk category

statement.text: The value of <~0.3 for excellent performance corresponds to the value of <~1 for minimally acceptable performance
The value of <~1 for minimally acceptable performance corresponds to the value of <~0.5 for good performance
The interpretation is Average error of classifying each drug into high, intermediate, or low risk category when the excellent performance is <~0.3
The interpretation is Average error of classifying each drug into high, intermediate, or low risk category when the good performance is <~0.5
The interpretation is Average error of classifying each drug into high, intermediate, or low risk category when the minimally acceptable performance is <~1
The good performance is <~0.5 when the excellent performance is <~0.3
The excellent performance is <~0.3 when the interpretation is Probability of ranking an intermediate-or-high risk drug above a low risk drug

The value of <~1 for minimally acceptable performance corresponds to the value of Likelihood ratio of a positive prediction (high-or-intermediate) occurring in high-or-intermediate risk drugs versus in low risk drugs for interpretation

The value of <~0.3 for excellent performance corresponds to the value of Likelihood ratio of a positive prediction (high-or-intermediate) occurring in high-or-intermediate risk drugs versus in low risk drugs for interpretation

The value of Likelihood ratio of a negative prediction (intermediate-or-low) occurring in high risk drugs versus in intermediate-or-low risk drugs for interpretation corresponds to the value of <~1 for minimally acceptable performance
The good performance is <~0.5 when the interpretation is Likelihood ratio of a positive prediction (high risk) occurring in high risk drugs versus in intermediate-or-low risk drugs
The value of <~0.5 for good performance corresponds to the value of Probability of correctly ranking a drug relative to CiPA reference drugs through pairwise comparison for interpretation
<~1 is in minimally acceptable performance
The value Likelihood ratio of a positive prediction (high risk) occurring in high risk drugs versus in intermediate-or-low risk drugs belongs to interpretation
Average error of classifying each drug into high, intermediate, or low risk category is in interpretation
The value Probability of ranking an intermediate-or-high risk drug above a low risk drug belongs to interpretation
Likelihood ratio of a negative prediction (low risk) occurring in high-or-intermediate risk drugs versus in low risk drugs is in interpretation
Probability of ranking a high risk drug above an intermediate-or-low drug is in interpretation
The value Probability of correctly ranking a drug relative to CiPA reference drugs through pairwise comparison belongs to interpretation
<~0.3 is in excellent performance
Likelihood ratio of a positive prediction (high-or-intermediate) occurring in high-or-intermediate risk drugs versus in low risk drugs is in interpretation
<~0.5 is in good performance
Likelihood ratio of a negative prediction (intermediate-or-low) occurring in high risk drugs versus in intermediate-or-low risk drugs is in interpretation
The value <~0.1 belongs to minimally acceptable performance
The value <~0.2 belongs to interpretation
Probability of ranking an intermediate-or-high risk drug above a low risk drug is in excellent performance
> ~ 5 is in minimally acceptable performance
The value <~0.5 belongs to excellent performance
Probability of correctly ranking a drug relative to CiPA reference drugs through pairwise comparison is in good performance
> ~ 10 is in interpretation
The value Likelihood ratio of a negative prediction (intermediate-or-low) occurring in high risk drugs versus in intermediate-or-low risk drugs belongs to excellent performance
The value > ~ 0.7 belongs to excellent performance
<~0.3 is in good performance
Likelihood ratio of a negative prediction (low risk) occurring in high-or-intermediate risk drugs versus in low risk drugs is in good performance
All the values in interpretation are distinct.
There are no duplicate values in good performance
